congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Authorizing, directing, facilitating, and expediting the transfer of administrative jurisdiction of certain Federal land
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 1397, to authorize, direct, facilitate, and expedite the transfer of administrative jurisdiction of certain Federal land, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 406 yeas with none voting ``nay'', Roll No. 345;

congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 1719, amended, to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire approximately 44 acres of land in Martinez, California, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 401 yeas to 15 nays, Roll No. 346;
